# IScheduling.Update method

A class implementing ISCheduling will be used at run-time to test rules

```csharp
public void Update(SchEvents sc, AStatesAgroMan s)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| sc | type with array lists of rules and managemnt events |
| s | states of the system, can be extended |
